text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump The over ELEVEN THOUSAND Floridians newly diagnosed with the #coronavirus in one day yesterday wil surely have a “happy” 4th...

The deaths lag behind the increased numbers, but they will sadly come.

Unforgivable.

#TrumpKillsFlorida 

https://t.co/MZTMkv0ulQ
